Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/ King Drive Temporary Reroute near Vincennes/115th
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses temporary rerouted NB: Ashland, Monterey and Vincennes; SB: Vincennes, Monterey, Marshfield and 115th: due to, near Vincennes/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip:

#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Vincennes/115th, due to street blockage near Vincennes/115th.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Monterey, Vincennes and over regular route.

Southbound buses will operate via Vincennes, Monterey, Marshfield, 115th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/87th Street
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are temp rerouted via Stony Island, 87th, Jeffery, 93rd and Stony Island due to, street blockage near Stony Island/87th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 87th, Jeffery, 93rd and Stony Island due to, street blockage near Stony Island/87th Street.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Cermak-Chinatown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Cermak-Chinatown. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
